org.mrcp4j.message.header
Class BaseValueFactory

java.lang.Object
  org.mrcp4j.message.header.BaseValueFactory
All Implemented Interfaces:
ValueFactory
Direct Known Subclasses:
GenericValueFactory
public abstract class BaseValueFactory
extends java.lang.Object
implements ValueFactory

Abstract ValueFactory providing basic implementation for all methods other than the main object creation method.

Author:
Niels Godfredsen <ngodfredsen@users.sourceforge.net>

Method Detail

validateObject

protected void validateObject(java.lang.Object valueObject)
                       throws IllegalValueException
Subclasses should override this method if there is any limitation on the valid values of the objects generated by this factory.

Parameters:
valueObject - object to be validated.
Throws:
IllegalValueException - if the value of the object passed is not valid for this factory.
